examples.example: 奶奶去买菜了，我在门口开心地等着奶奶回来。

translate.english: Grandma has gone to buy vegetables, and I am waiting happily at the door for grandma to come back.

examples.example: 每次爸爸出差回来，都会给我带有趣的礼物。

translate.english: Every time my father comes back from a business trip, he will bring me interesting gifts.

examples.example: 我的好朋友去外地旅游了，我期待着他早日回来与我分享旅途趣事。

translate.english: My good friend has gone to travel in other places, and I am looking forward to his early return to share the interesting things during the journey with me.
